Chess-Position-Notation.md.title: Chess Position Notation
Chess-Position-Notation.md.description: Specifications and implementation guide to represent a canonical board position, preventing from duplicates, as defined through the rules of chess.

Chess-Actor-Notation.md.title: Chess Actor Notation
Chess-Actor-Notation.md.description: Specifications and implementation guide to represent a canonical actor, preventing from duplicates, as defined through the rules of chess.

Chess-Gameplay-Notation.md.title: Chess Gameplay Notation
Chess-Gameplay-Notation.md.description: Specifications and implementation guide to represent a canonical gameplay, preventing from duplicates, as defined through the rules of chess.

Forsyth-Edwards-Expanded-Notation.md.title: Forsythâ€“Edwards Expanded Notation
Forsyth-Edwards-Expanded-Notation.md.description: Specifications and implementation guide to represent a particular board position in any number of dimensions, as a picture of the game at a given moment.

General-Actor-Notation.md.title: General Actor Notation
General-Actor-Notation.md.description: Specifications and implementation guide to represent an actor from abstract strategy games.

General-Gameplay-Notation.md.title: General Gameplay Notation
General-Gameplay-Notation.md.description: Specifications and implementation guide to represent patterns of moves, as specified in most abstract strategy rules.

Portable-Chess-Notation.md.title: Portable Chess Notation
Portable-Chess-Notation.md.description: Specifications and implementation guide to represent a chess game (both the moves and related data).

Portable-Action-Notation.md.title: Portable Action Notation
Portable-Action-Notation.md.description: Specifications and implementation guide to represent an action, from most abstract strategy board games.
